verses.name: Job 31:12
verses.text: For it is a fire that consumeth to destruction, and would root out all mine increase.

verses.name: Job 31:13
verses.text: If I did despise the cause of my manservant or of my maidservant, when they contended with me;

verses.name: Job 31:14
verses.text: What then shall I do when God riseth up? and when he visiteth, what shall I answer him?

verses.name: Job 31:15
verses.text: Did not he that made me in the womb make him? and did not one fashion us in the womb?

verses.name: Job 31:16
verses.text: If I have withheld the poor from their desire, or have caused the eyes of the widow to fail;
